website_summaries.verdict: Seriously strong neodymium magnets for home or garage use.
pros: Finished with triple-layer coating to protect again corrosion
When bolted to a mounting surface, can hold up to 90 pounds
cons: So powerful that you must be careful to keep them separate because they are hard to pry apart, or can “bite” your skin

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Super strong. Warning the magnets will ship together with a plastic washer separating them apart. Slide the magnets apart and then keep apart. I tried doing this with one hand while still holding the box in the other and the magnets slapped back together with our the washer and it took my vice and a large set of pliers to get them back apart. Hard to tell what picture is but that's a 10lbs sledge being held only by the magnets on the walk. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Keller Mccowen

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend that the manufacture include or market some non marking ...
customer_reviews.text: These little puppies are no joke whatsoever! I have actually purchased them to use in substitute for gun magnets and they are strong enough to hold in position the barrel of a 12 gauge, a fully loaded .223, and will hold a loaded semi auto pistol in place without a problem. I would recommend that the manufacture include or market some non marking felt, rubber or plastic covers and the uses will be endless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Seriously strong!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are great. VERY well-made, and definitely neodymium. They're so strong! Obviously made for industrial purposes, they also work great as fridge magnets if you have serious weight to hold up. (You'd have to slide them off the side, tho.) The counter-sunk hole makes it very easy to mount these to a wall or pegboard, and the design of them means that the entire magnetic field is on one side of the magnet, doubling its strength. I do not doubt for a second that these could hold 75 lbs. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Draven

customer_reviews.title: These things bite!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnets. If you're not careful they will bite you (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Take care when opening - But a good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Extremely strong. Even though it had warnings on it, I did not perceive how strong they were. Trying to pull them apart with my fingers and ended up with a large blood blister. My bad, not the sellers,, they had the warnings. Slide them apart, and if you have gloves, even better.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: nice magnets
customer_reviews.text: nice for holding metal tools in a garage, just screw it into a stud just remember they are only as strong as the screw attaching the magnet, note I do not think they come with screws pictured(mine had non) but they are a standard size not really enough room in the package for them.
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: Strong home magnets.
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful using these. I pulled them apart and was not paying attention and when they snapped back together, I lost a hunk of my finger! Then it was nearly impossible to pry them apart again. Luckily I had read on one of the reviews to put a nut and bolt in the hole of one of them to keep them separated, and having done that, all is well.
customer_reviews.author: TOKitt

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought this because the TAQTON N52 ring which I bought earlier, was not powerful enough for my purpose. According to the rating this one should have been 3 times as strong, but in fact was much weaker. Also it did not come with screws. It was not in a metal box like all other magnets that I have bought, just in a small cardboard box. I suppose the screws fell out during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: like Superman Strong
customer_reviews.text: These are strong.... like Superman Strong. There was a little piece between the two magnets when I got it. I KNEW that if i removed that piece apart from one another, I am gonna have a bad time getting it off one another. Thats what happened... By Brute force Later I managed to get them separated. Overall experience with it was awesome and still good because i can pick up small things with it with no progelm. Plus I love magnets ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: Rookie Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great stud finders!
customer_reviews.text: Use these to find studs in the wall and they’re 100%accurate every time- Not like that very expensive stud finder I bought which runs about 15% accurate and results in dozens of unnecessary holes in the walls . No more useless holes in the sheet rock! I store these on the outside of my tool box . Just slide em right off the edge and go.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy

customer_reviews.title: Strong? Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Most pleased with product & speed of delivery. Purchased magnets from other vendors looking for strong holding power and these puppies filled the bill. My project was to make apron closers from dowel pieces and glue magnets on...gave up per bonding problems and weak holding power. Now, simply cut 1" of dowel, drill 3/8" hole near base, screw these gals t'other end, slip apron strings through holes and viola'...apron stays closed. Saves on arthritic shoulders & fumbling strings. Good things!
customer_reviews.author: L. Carl

customer_reviews.title: In short, I'm impressed with the holding power of ...
customer_reviews.text: In short, I'm impressed with the holding power of these magnets! I got them to hold an emergency responder light to the top of my truck using some improvised brackets. This is where I ran into an unexpected situation. I assumed, (maybe I didn't read the description properly) but I thought these would have the same holding power on both sides. As it turns out they don't. Not a big problem, I just had to do a little more improvising to make them work. Having the countersunk holes was a big help. I've been up to 70 mph and the light stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yates

customer_reviews.title: Love these things for there power, but....
customer_reviews.text: don't tighten the mounting screw down tighter than snug, if you do it will break the magnet. Also I wish they used a higher grade of stainless steel on the base. I'm using these at sea for a magnetic marine antenna mount and they rust (lightly).
customer_reviews.author: A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Securing metal blinds to metal window frame: A magnetically attractive idea
customer_reviews.text: Why did I need these very powerful magnets? Simple! My metal-framed, thermal-pane windows are recessed. I cannot drill into the frames without popping the air-tight seals. The plaster surrounding the window is too shallow to hold screws. So I hung them within the recessed area and they look secure. However, I won't manipulate them much; they are mostly for privacy. Thanks. "Mary Consumer"
customer_reviews.author: mary customer

customer_reviews.title: These are not your father's magnets
customer_reviews.text: I just got 6 of them for projects. The first thing I noticed was that unless you have tools don’t stick them together without handles or hooks. I’m counting the number of times I use the Vice Vs Big Slip Joint Pliers. Go to YouTube and search “Big Neodymium Magnets Destroying Stuff” and be safe. So far I would say 100 % happy at this Time. Screws are too small for this application but are nice Screws few missing. I look forward to building DIY if get likes I will share some. Live Long and Prosper.
customer_reviews.author: Popeye the Sailor Man

customer_reviews.title: ... but they are just slightly to wek they are great refrigerator magnets but you can't have to much between ...
customer_reviews.text: This are strong magnets not as strong as I was hoping for I was going to use them to find metal studs and screws in walls but they are just slightly to wek they are great refrigerator magnets but you can't have to much between the magnet and metal maby a half inch of material I use to have one that almost could pool nails out of dry wall overall it's a good magnet o and if you got 2 and they stick together it's a pain to take them apart
customer_reviews.author: Max Kwiecien

customer_reviews.title: They can easily open the door but it strongly stays closed when ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY STRONG MAGNETS! used it at the preschool for stall door to hold it in place since we removed locks from bathrooms for safety of kids not locking themselves up. They can easily open the door but it strongly stays closed when needed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Alok Kakker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Pull
customer_reviews.text: Great magnets. Very strong. I bought them to glue on base of a goose neck lamp I bought to put on my band saw. The magnets on the new light were too weak to hold the light. I glued one of these magnets on the base and now I have to use a screwdriver to remove the light. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful magnets
customer_reviews.text: These are EXTREMELY POWERFUL for their size. I pinched my finger and got a blood blister when I tried to pry them apart. I have them to hold a hidden door closed. It takes a lot of effort to get it open which is what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Justin McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnets. So strong they flipped in my hand and caught the skin at the tip of my finger when they stuck together. They were so strong, I couldn't get them apart! Seriously! I actually had to cut the skin off my finger to get free. I didn't expect that kind of strength. It was a good lesson for me, but it freaked my son out. He wants me to throw them away (and only give them a one star rating).
customer_reviews.author: gregory p. giacomino

customer_reviews.title: Holds my 400lb steel gate open
customer_reviews.text: I hammered a 2ft square steel tube into the ground with one foot above ground and screwed one of these magnets to the steel tube. Just one of these magnets holds my heavy gate open even on a windy day. I used to have to put a brick or something to hold it open
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are for real, exceeded expectations. Bought ...
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are for real, exceeded expectations. Bought them to latch a metal gate located on a dock, the current latch allowed the gate to jiggle and make to much noise. Replaced the latch with these magnets, the gate is now quiet and secure (actually a little hard to open). I'm ordering another set for a deck gate. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Not bad magnets but anything thicker the 1/8 they won’t stick very well
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Soooo strong. I put them in a drawer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Soooo strong. I put them in a drawer and they attached to everything in there. Don't do that
customer_reviews.author: Manny C.

customer_reviews.title: but they could be useful if you need a very powerful mountable magnet
customer_reviews.text: Too strong for my application, but they could be useful if you need a very powerful mountable magnet. So strong that I was worried about crushing my fingernail while separating them. I store them between a 3/4" shelf until I can figure out what to do with them, and they're still pulling very hard.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are great! I use them to hold pieces of metal to a jig when grinding and they do the trick. They are very strong and hold well for everything I have tried so far. Did I say great? GREEEAAAAATTTTT! Topped off with fast shipping to boot. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: rezz93

customer_reviews.title: great for holding outdoor metal gate
customer_reviews.text: I used it to hold a metal gate that keeps moving around in the wind. Works great. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Ewe C Tan

customer_reviews.title: STRONG magnets
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnets! Don't feel like I need magnets this strong but I'll definitely find a use for them. Very nice quality. I like the way they were packed with a washer like thing in between them to make separating them easier. Sure helped me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JMKM

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are very strong, and fully encased to prevent ...
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are very strong, and fully encased to prevent damage to them. These are used outside so I don't know yet how they will weather.
customer_reviews.author: John E Lawst

customer_reviews.title: The Crazy eddie of magnets .
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are insanely powerful. They seem to be well made and my testing shows that they will hold most steel tools without a problem. A word of caution - be careful with these ! They can easily pinch your fingers ! The power of these magnets is insane !
customer_reviews.author: John G. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Very strong!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are great, very strong. I bought them to use with magnetic putty, and although I haven't had the chance to use them, I have no doubt they will work splendidly. I wish they had been a tad smaller, but a slightly larger magnet will work just as well (perhaps even better for demonstration purposes).
customer_reviews.author: That one guy

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Had almost no trouble separating them. Sewed one on the end of a strap that has a hook on the other end. The hook goes through the latch on our front-load washer door, the magnet sits on the side of the washer just far enough back that the door stays ajar when not being used. Lets air into the machine, but keeps the door from swinging totally open. That magnet goes nowhere - which could not be said about the first magnet I tried.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service great product
customer_reviews.text: This company provides excellent customer service and the magnets are of very high quality. They were not quite what I needed when I received but the company quickly took care of the refund. The magnet itself was very strong and of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful earth magnets that I've used in several applications and uses. Great magnets! I will order again!

customer_reviews.title: These are some amazing magnets! I bought them to make a utensil ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some amazing magnets! I bought them to make a utensil holder but they work so well I'm ordering more for additional projects around the house. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Really strong Magnet. Got to remember that size of the magnets is comparable to the penny and screws. Otherwise, great magnet

customer_reviews.title: These guys are no nonsense magnets. They will hold ...
customer_reviews.text: These guys are no nonsense magnets. They will hold any iron object short of lifting a 100 pound anvil.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful magnets. Perfect for tools!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful magnets. Perfect for tools! Don't get your car too close though or you may not be able to pull it away (mostly kidding! But these are powerful magnets.) I will buy more of these if I decide i need more.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent utilitarian magnets for your home project
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. If you want to hang an outdoor curtain on any steel frame, these will do the trick.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to install. Two of them will hold a handgun in place and offer a bit of resistance when pulled.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Indeed strong and fastens well. I bought these and screwed them to my Milwaukee M12 work lights. I'm going to get a few more.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GREAT GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: We are newlyweds in a new place and these have been great!! They hold up our iron on the wall, and whether hot or cool, it works great! Nothing but the best to say about these magnets, they are our best purchase of the year!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super strong. I'm using these for a false firewood/fireplace cover to stick to the fireplace surround.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Lapic

customer_reviews.title: Should Do the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Building a hidden wall compartment, and was looking for a way to secure the decorative faux cover to the interior frame I've clad with some angle iron. These look to be perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to hold a heavy bulletin board to a metal door, and small rare earth magnets couldn't hold it. These magnets were exactly as advertised and now the board is firmly attached. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: These are super powerful magnets. I really like them. I'm thinking of using them to hold a small gate open. I'm currently using them to pin papers to my front door.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for applications outside the kitchen, too. Mine will be used to secure an auxiliary fence on my table saw.

customer_reviews.text: Talk about "heavy duty" magnets. Wow. I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase. These suckers pull metal.

customer_reviews.text: I used them on steel posts to hold the privately fabric to the posts without any holes in the fabric. So far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful enough.

customer_reviews.title: Strongest magnets ever!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are exactly what I wanted! I thought I would need both magnets ( they came 2 to a package) but 1 was powerful enough to get the job done. It's PERFECT. I searched every hardware store in town before resorting to the internet. So glad I found you! Many thanks.

customer_reviews.title: These are great books.
customer_reviews.text: I hangmoot holders and the like on the sides of the refrigerator. For years the little magnet hooks would slide down. Bought these and no more sliding.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We are using these incredibly powerful magnets ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We are using these incredibly powerful magnets as stud finders in our plaster walls - hang them with a piece of string and glide them over the wall and they are attracted to the nails used to attach the lath to the studs. I'm sure we'll find many more uses for them!

product_meta.title: Nexlevl Extreme Power Rare Earth Magnets, 2 Industrial Strength Round Base Neodymium Magnets, 90lb+ Holding Force, 1.26" Diameter, Countersunk Hole for #10 Bolt, Strongest Available
product_meta.description:
✔ YOU WILL BE MIND-BLOWN AT HOW POWERFUL THESE MAGNETS ARE: Perfect for Quickly Organizing and Hanging Your Tools in the Workshop, and Decluttering Your Home and Garage. Now Comes with 2 Premium Quality Nickel Finished 20mm Screws.

✔ INCREDIBLE HOLDING POWER: When Bolted to a Mounting Surface a Single One of these Rare Earth Cup Magnets can Securely Hold up to 88lbs when Attached Directly to a Thick Magnetic Surface or Steel Plate.

✔ SUPER EASY SETUP: It's as Simple as Bolting Each Powerful Round Magnet to Your Mounting Surface with a #10 Screw or Similar.

✔ PREMIUM MATERIALS: Thoughtfully Designed with Strength and Functionality First, Finished with a Beautiful Nickel Plated Coating.

✔ HIGHEST QUALITY WITH A WARRANTY: The Unique Design of Already Powerful Neo Magnets Inside of a Hard Steel Case Provides Excellent Mechanical Properties and Durability For a Lifetime. Buy Today with Absolutely No-Risk Knowing that You are backed by Our Famous 100% Money Back Guarantee if You Are Not Fully Satisfied.
These Rare Earth Premium Quality Neodymium Magnets are designed for amazing durability and ease-of-use that will last for years. 

Wish you could maximize space in the garage very quicky?

Wanting to save floor space by easily hanging up tools in your workshop? 

Looking for extra strong magnets for metal fishing? 

These corrosion resistant magnets will quickly prove to be the handiest organizers around the house with countless uses for work and play. 

Perfect for Office Storage and Organization, Arts and Crafts, Hobby Projects, Cabinet Door Hardware, and many other projects. 

Purchase Today Completely Risk Free with our 100% Money Back Guarantee No Questions Asked, and quickly discover how these ultra strong magnets can make a difference helping you organize and declutter your home quicker than ever before.
feature_bullets: ✔ YOU WILL BE MIND-BLOWN AT HOW POWERFUL THESE NEO MAGNETS ARE: Much Higher Quality than Other Brands. Perfect for Quickly Organizing and Hanging Your Tools in the Workshop, and Decluttering Your Home and Garage. Now Comes with 2 Premium Quality Nickel Finished 20mm Screws.

✔ INCREDIBLE HOLDING POWER: When Bolted to a Mounting Surface a Single One of these Rare Earth Cup Magnets can Securely Hold up to 90lbs when Attached Directly to a Thick Magnetic Surface or Steel Plate. Please be Careful when Handling these Magnets Close to Each other. Very Very Strong.
✔ SUPER EASY SETUP: It's as Simple as Bolting Each Powerful Round Magnet to Your Mounting Surface with a #10 Screw or Similar. Excellent for use as a Magnetic Gun Mount, especially for Trucks.

✔ PREMIUM MATERIALS: Thoughtfully Designed with Strength and Functionality First, Finished with a Beautiful Triple Layer Coating to help Protect against Corrosion and Rust, which makes these Perfect Fishing Magnets.

✔ HIGHEST QUALITY WITH A WARRANTY: The Unique Design of Already Powerful Neo Magnets Inside of a Hard Steel Case Provides Excellent Mechanical Properties and Durability For a Lifetime. Buy Today with Absolutely No-Risk Knowing that You are backed by Our Famous 100% Money Back Guarantee if You Are Not Fully Satisfied. If you have ANY issue at all, please contact KitchNMate Products before issueing a refund and we will make sure you are promptly and correctly taken care of.
